verbs.description: [ARG0: LeBron James and Stephen Curry] [V: made] [ARG1: it clear] [ARGM-TMP: earlier this week] [C-ARG1: that no matter who wins the NBA championship this year , neither team would be making the traditional White House visit .] President Trump said Friday morning [C-ARG1: that neither team would be invited]

LeBron James and Stephen Curry made it clear earlier this week that no matter [ARG0: who] [V: wins] [ARG1: the NBA championship] [ARGM-TMP: this year] , neither team would be making the traditional White House visit . President Trump said Friday morning that neither team would be invited

President Trump said Friday morning that neither team would be invited
